Actions.Title: Text Expander Creator
Actions.Prompt:
%Variable%ddm_create_expander_msg%

‚ö†Ô∏è Warning: Make sure "_design_maestro_expander" group is created (left panel).

Actions.Text:
tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine"	set trigger to getvariable "snippetTrigger"	set expansion to getvariable "snippetExpansion"end tellset triggerXML to "<dict>
<key>MacroTriggerType</key>
<string>TypedString</string>
<key>SimulateDeletes</key>
<true/>
<key>TypedString</key>
<string>" & |trigger| & "</string>
</dict>"set expansionXML to "<dict>
<key>Action</key>
<string>ByTyping</string>
<key>MacroActionType</key>
<string>InsertText</string>
<key>TargetApplication</key>
<dict/>
<key>TargetingType</key>
<string>Front</string>
<key>Text</key>
<string>" & expansion & "</string>
</dict>"tell application "Keyboard Maestro"	tell macro group "_design_maestro_expander"		set m to make new macro with properties {name:expansion}		tell m			make new trigger with properties {xml:triggerXML}			make new action with properties {xml:expansionXML}		end tell	end tellend tell

Name: __DM:Create Text Expander
CustomIconData: KMEP-GenericApplication-/Users/overment/Applications/Chrome Apps.localized/Design Maestro | Automate your design workflow.app
